description:
Employer Industry: Global Payments Enablement and Software

Why Consider this Job Opportunity:
- Competitive compensation, including Restricted Stock Units
- Opportunity for career advancement and growth within the organization
- Immersive Global Induction Program to learn from executives and global teams
- Dynamic and collaborative global team
- Wellbeing programs and support for mental health and wellness
- Meaningful impact on the success of the company

What to Expect (Job Responsibilities):
- Manage full sales cycle, including prospecting, demos, and meetings
- Generate new business through pipeline creation and lead generation
- Clearly communicate and demonstrate the value proposition of Flywire
- Achieve monthly and quarterly revenue quotas
- Lead and inspire a sales team to exceed performance expectations

What is Required (Qualifications):
- Bachelor's Degree
- 7-10 years of relevant SaaS sales/closing experience
- 5+ years of direct sales management/leadership experience
- Consultative sales skills and ability to build strong client relationships
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Proven ability to provide guidance and mentorship to team members

How to Stand Out (Preferred Qualifications):
- Experience in a leadership role within a sales environment
- Willingness to travel for customer meetings when appropriate
